##[debug]Evaluating success:
##[debug]=> true
##[debug]Result: true
##[debug]Starting: Copy build output to artifacts directory
##[debug]Loading inputs
##[debug]Evaluating: format('$artifactDir = "artifacts/QuickNotes-v{0}-{1}"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Create the artifact directory
##[debug]New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $artifactDir
##[debug]
##[debug]# Create QuickNotes subfolder
##[debug]New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path "$artifactDir/QuickNotes"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Find the build output directory
##[debug]$buildOutput = Get-ChildItem -Path "QuickNotes" -Recurse -Directory | 
##[debug]               Where-Object {{ $_.Name -eq "Release" -and $_.FullName -like "*{2}*" }} | 
##[debug]               Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
##[debug]
##[debug]Write-Host "Found build output directory: $buildOutput"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Find the .NET runtime folder (net9.0-windows10.0.22621.0) inside the build output
##[debug]$runtimeFolder = Get-ChildItem -Path $buildOutput -Directory | 
##[debug]                 Where-Object {{ $_.Name -like "net*-windows*" }} | 
##[debug]                 Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
##[debug]
##[debug]Write-Host "Found runtime folder: $runtimeFolder"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Copy all files from the runtime folder directly to the QuickNotes subfolder
##[debug]if (Test-Path $runtimeFolder) {{
##[debug]  Copy-Item -Path "$runtimeFolder/*" -Destination "$artifactDir/QuickNotes" -Recurse
##[debug]  Write-Host "Files copied successfully"
##[debug]}} else {{
##[debug]  Write-Error "Runtime folder not found"
##[debug]  exit 1
##[debug]}}
##[debug]', steps.get_version.outputs.VERSION, matrix.platform, matrix.platform)
##[debug]Evaluating format:
##[debug]..Evaluating String:
##[debug]..=> '$artifactDir = "artifacts/QuickNotes-v{0}-{1}"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Create the artifact directory

##[debug]
##[debug]# Create QuickNotes subfolder
##[debug]New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path "$artifactDir/QuickNotes"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Find the build output directory
##[debug]$buildOutput = Get-ChildItem -Path "QuickNotes" -Recurse -Directory | 
##[debug]               Where-Object {{ $_.Name -eq "Release" -and $_.FullName -like "*{2}*" }} | 
##[debug]               Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
##[debug]
##[debug]Write-Host "Found build output directory: $buildOutput"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Find the .NET runtime folder (net9.0-windows10.0.22621.0) inside the build output
##[debug]$runtimeFolder = Get-ChildItem -Path $buildOutput -Directory | 
##[debug]                 Where-Object {{ $_.Name -like "net*-windows*" }} | 
##[debug]                 Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
##[debug]
##[debug]Write-Host "Found runtime folder: $runtimeFolder"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Copy all files from the runtime folder directly to the QuickNotes subfolder
##[debug]if (Test-Path $runtimeFolder) {{
##[debug]  Copy-Item -Path "$runtimeFolder/*" -Destination "$artifactDir/QuickNotes" -Recurse
##[debug]  Write-Host "Files copied successfully"
##[debug]}} else {{
##[debug]  Write-Error "Runtime folder not found"
##[debug]  exit 1
##[debug]}}
##[debug]'

##[debug]....=> Object
##[debug]....Evaluating String:
##[debug]....=> 'platform'
##[debug]..=> 'x64'
##[debug]=> '$artifactDir = "artifacts/QuickNotes-v2025.03.24-2bb660d-x64"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Create the artifact directory
##[debug]New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $artifactDir
##[debug]
##[debug]# Create QuickNotes subfolder
##[debug]New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path "$artifactDir/QuickNotes"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Find the build output directory
##[debug]$buildOutput = Get-ChildItem -Path "QuickNotes" -Recurse -Directory | 
##[debug]               Where-Object { $_.Name -eq "Release" -and $_.FullName -like "*x64*" } | 
##[debug]               Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
##[debug]
##[debug]Write-Host "Found build output directory: $buildOutput"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Find the .NET runtime folder (net9.0-windows10.0.22621.0) inside the build output
##[debug]$runtimeFolder = Get-ChildItem -Path $buildOutput -Directory | 
##[debug]                 Where-Object { $_.Name -like "net*-windows*" } | 
##[debug]                 Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
##[debug]
##[debug]Write-Host "Found runtime folder: $runtimeFolder"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Copy all files from the runtime folder directly to the QuickNotes subfolder
##[debug]if (Test-Path $runtimeFolder) {
##[debug]  Copy-Item -Path "$runtimeFolder/*" -Destination "$artifactDir/QuickNotes" -Recurse
##[debug]  Write-Host "Files copied successfully"
##[debug]} else {
##[debug]  Write-Error "Runtime folder not found"
##[debug]  exit 1
##[debug]}
##[debug]'
##[debug]Result: '$artifactDir = "artifacts/QuickNotes-v2025.03.24-2bb660d-x64"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Create the artifact directory
##[debug]New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $artifactDir
##[debug]
##[debug]# Create QuickNotes subfolder
##[debug]New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path "$artifactDir/QuickNotes"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Find the build output directory
##[debug]$buildOutput = Get-ChildItem -Path "QuickNotes" -Recurse -Directory | 
##[debug]               Where-Object { $_.Name -eq "Release" -and $_.FullName -like "*x64*" } | 
##[debug]               Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
##[debug]
##[debug]Write-Host "Found build output directory: $buildOutput"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Find the .NET runtime folder (net9.0-windows10.0.22621.0) inside the build output
##[debug]$runtimeFolder = Get-ChildItem -Path $buildOutput -Directory | 
##[debug]                 Where-Object { $_.Name -like "net*-windows*" } | 
##[debug]                 Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty FullName
##[debug]
##[debug]Write-Host "Found runtime folder: $runtimeFolder"
##[debug]
##[debug]# Copy all files from the runtime folder directly to the QuickNotes subfolder
##[debug]if (Test-Path $runtimeFolder) {
##[debug]  Copy-Item -Path "$runtimeFolder/*" -Destination "$artifactDir/QuickNotes" -Recurse
##[debug]  Write-Host "Files copied successfully"
##[debug]} else {
##[debug]  Write-Error "Runtime folder not found"
##[debug]  exit 1
##[debug]}
